articles.title: Romain Bardet, James Shaw out of Tour de France after stage 14 descent crash - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Frenchman out from 12th place after fall on Col de Saxel downhill
articles.content:
Romain Bardet and James Shaw have become the fourth and fifth abandon in stage 14 of the Tour de France after the French allrounder and British Tour debutant crashed early on the stage.
